int Crossfade::Playlist::next (  )  [inline]

Returns the next Index of the MediaFile that should played as next.

It consider the actual state of Shuffle and Repeat

Returns:
Returns an integer that announces the index of the next MediaFile that should play.

int Crossfade::Playlist::prev (  )  [inline]

To get the previous Media-File that played.

If Shuffle is true, it only return a new random Index.

Returns:
An integer that points to the Index of the previous played file.
